comments:
I found this exception by accident since I thought I was in my Java 
perspective, but if you click on a test suite file while in the CVS repository 
browsing perspective an error will be logged and nothing will be opened.  
Clicking on other file types in this perspective seem to bring up their 
respective editors/views.  Here is the stack trace:

Found in Dec 12 Hyades build.

Update component in order for this defect to be tracked by the Test committers 
group

Now that we have a "3.3" Version in bugzilla, updating bugzillas targeted to 3.3
or a 3.3 iteration so that their Version matches their Target. "future",
"unspecified", "4.0", and "4.1" Versions will not be updated.
move target to 4.2 since this will not be done in 4.1
Reassign to Jerome for tptp 4.2. in accordance with discussion in Test project meeting 12/12/2005.

Fixed.
In the CVS perspective the input of the editor is not a FileEditorInput but a IStorageEditorInput. The fix fills this lack.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
